title: Roasted apricots and basil with apricot and pistachio biscotti and apricot ice cream
description: Make any or all parts of this heavenly dessert. The biscotti store well and any leftovers can be served with coffee.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need an ice cream maker.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split lengthways, seeds scraped out
2 tbsp apricot liqueur or apricot brandy
